Text: Failing to submit or pay a VAT return carries a fixed surcharge of up to 15% based on how many times you default in a 12 month period.
Cause: Failing to submit or pay a VAT return
Effect: a fixed surcharge of up to 15% based on how many times you default in a 12 month period.
Sentence: <e1>Failing to submit or pay a VAT return</e1> carries <e2>a fixed surcharge of up to 15% based on how many times you default in a 12 month period.</e2>
